item.title: Modernize WPF Desktop applications to ASP.NET Core MVC with Amazon Q Developer
item.description: Introduction A medical imaging customer recently approached our team with a need to modernize their legacy Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) Framework desktop applications into ASP.NET Core MVC Web applications. They wanted to use an agentic approach to speed up their modernization to achieve the up to 4x speed that other customers have realized with Amazon [â€¦] Link to article: https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/dotnet/modernize-wpf-desktop-applications-to-asp-net-core-mvc-with-amazon-q-developer/
